name: MITRE ATT&CK Layer
description: Showing techniques used by Citrine Sleet.

techniques.comment: Citrine Sleet targeted cryptocurrency managed organizations with weaponized documents in the form of fake job applications
Citrine Sleet utilized spearphishing techniques and lured targets to thier FUDModule rootkit using weaponized applications
Citrine Sleet exploited the Chromium zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2024-7971) to gain remote code execution
The FudModule rootkit was used for collecting information necessary to seize control of the targets’ cryptocurrency assets
FudModule is a rootkit malware used by both Citrine Sleet and Diamond Sleet
Shellcode was injected into the Chromium rendering process to further deliver the FudModule rootkit
Shellcode was injected into the Chromium rendering process to further deliver the FudModule rootkit
AppleJeus malware was used to gather necessary credentials to gain control of targets' cryptocurrency assets
An unknown deployment tool was used to exploit the zero-day vulnerability and deploy the FudModule rootkit
Possible brute force or other hacking techniques relying on gathered information from AppleJeus malware
